title: Drew It Again (The Adam and Dr. Drew Show Classics)
itunes:title: Drew It Again (The Adam and Dr. Drew Show Classics)
description: Adam opens the show telling Drew about his experience the night before going to see Foo Fighters at The Forum. Adam discusses how he's settles into tasks and links that up to some of his racing experiences. Later they turn to the phones and speak to a caller who had a tumor removed and is worried about the pain medication he was given as well as a caller who is looking for ways to relieve his mother's migraine headaches.
